metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3231 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The Render cache system in Drupal 7.x before 7.38, when used to cachecontent by user role, allows remote authenticated users to obtain privatecontent viewed by user 1 by reading the cache.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3231` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.38-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.38-1').
